title: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
body:

Genres/Tags: RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese, Turn-based
Companies: Gust, Koei Tecmo Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI4
Original Size: 7.8 GB
Repack Size: from 1.7 GB [Selective Download]

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Atelier.Sophie.The.Alchemist.of.the.Mysterious.Book.DX-CODEX ISO release: codex-atelier.sophie.the.alchemist.of.the.mysterious.book.dx.iso (8,386,052,096 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of DLC audio tracks, credits video, digital artbook and Japanese/Chinese videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 7.8 to 1.7~5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 4-10 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 9.4 GB
  • Audio language can be changed in game settings
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game UI language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The Mysterious series combines heart-warming everyday elements with extraordinary experiences in a world full of wonders.

The 1st instalment, “Atelier Sophie”, is back in DX form!

What makes it DX

  • New episodes of Sophie’s growth and a new costume that will help her follow in her grandmother’s steps!
  • Three new cauldrons to assist in your adventures!
  • Sprinting option to make getting around a lot easier!
  • ‘Fast Forward’ feature for fast-paced battles!
  • Lots of previously released DLC!
  • Photo mode to enjoy capturing beautiful images!

The Story – ~A Journey to Restore Memories of Alchemy~

A chance encounter between a young alchemist Sophie and a sentient book Plachta takes them on an adventure to recover Plachta’s memories and gain alchemic knowledge.

Game Introductions

As a fledgling alchemist, Sophie works with Plachta on various alchemic recipes in order to hone her skills. As they learns new recipes, explore the fields, collect materials, and synthesize new items, the power of alchemy and Plachta’s memories begin to come to life.

Note: The English version includes English voice. (Note that some events do not include English voice).
